Rising prices should naturally compel farmers to expand operations and grow in higher volumes.When I had COVID. I lost senses of taste and smell. Sense of hunger was also lost. comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Personally, I see that food is linked to economic and environmental changes, and oil is linked to political changes. Therefore, when economic and environmental crises come, it is an opportunity for individuals to try to be self-sufficient, especially in the countryside, and to save on expenses for individuals in cities.Even in our region, where it is impossible to farm with economic feasibility, governments have begun to support agricultural projects and go to buy lands in countries that have agricultural capabilities.
